> You can access this file at the URL:
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/gladiator/files/Scenarios/NEWIDEA.zip 

Here's closer to the final version.  I want to do more work on the
corners, though; I want to give them the feel of towers added to the
corners of the castle.  The teleporters are there, well, to keep your
hired team from doing anything stupid (anybody got a better idea of
how to preserve the look AND keep your hired team from doing the wrong
thing).  I'm a little concerned about the courtyard entrance to the
main area of the castle being a little crowded, though.

I got the idea after watching a video in World History class about
castle construction in England.
